title: Team Recruitment Discord Server For Everyone! [C] [SS] [S] [Any Rank] [Any Region]
body:
If you're looking for team members, you're coming to the right place! We've got members from **North America**, **Europe** (EUW and EUNE) and even here, **Oceania** all looking for teams to join, or extra members to join a team!

If there are any tournaments going on, be sure to announce it so everyone can join in if they are wanting to!

This isn't just for people to play in tournaments, or ranked teams, it can be for people wanting to play in some normal games, make new friends, and duo partners.

Come along and use commands to make it easier for people to find who their looking for!

For an example, if you're a Gold Mid lane main on **OCE**, once you join the server, you'd use the commands;
**?rank OCE**
**?rank Gold**
**?rank Mid**

With them commands, people would be able to find you better if they're looking for someone like you! Anyone is able to tag any of the roles.
If someone is looking for a Mid laner, they will ping **@Mid** and everyone who has that tag, will be granted a notification!

If you have any questions, or need help with anything, we have a #support channel where our support team help out with anything you need! (in the best of their ability) 

Come along, join us, make friends! This is a healthy community that I (and many others) would love to see grow!

replies.body: Hello, I currently in Oceania serve. I was gold in s6 back in Taiwanese serve. Although it has been months I have not play but still have some skills back there. How can I join your community? I main top. I got friends for adc, mid and jg. Although I am the only one receive gold in here. But those guys are willing to try their best in game. Thanks mate.

Hi i main really any lane best at bot and mid and i was wondering if i could join one and have a little fun while still trying
{{champion:222}}  {{champion:134}}
